cleaned_text: Aromatherapy Massage in Moon Twp Aromatherapy massage in Moon Twp utilizes the addition of essential oils to massage techniques. What is aromatherapy massage in Moon Twp? Generally done w/ more relaxing strokes. Essential oils vary depending on the result that is desired to achieve. Different oils will produce different feelings of well-being and is discussed with clients prior to their session. The therapist may have the client inhale the essential oils or apply them directly to be absorbed through the skin. Commonly used oils are: Eucalyptus, Lavender, Chamomile, Ylang Ylang, Geranium, Orange, Lemon, Rosemary, Bergamot, Tea Tree, Cedarwood, Peppermint, Clary Sage, Palo Santo, Sandalwood. According to the National Cancer Institute (NCI), aromatherapy has been shown to relieve: - Anxiety - Depression - Insomnia - Menstrual Pain - Nausea Contraindications: (Always notify your therapist if you have any of these.) - Some oils are not good for pregnant or lactating women - Severe Asthma or respiratory conditions - Severe allergies or Skin Sensitivity - Skin Rashes or Open Wounds OFFICE HOURS Monday 9:00am - 1:00pm - 1:00pm 3:00pm - 6:00pm Saturday & Sunday Closed
